readable.title: 241346402_5c070a0c6d
readable.content: A man in a baseball hat and sunglasses watching an event in a crowd . A man in a blue hat is watching something that is happening off camera . A man in sunglasses and a baseball cap stands beside a TV cameraman in stadium full of people . A man in sunglasses and a blue cap looking onward . The man in the gray shirt has a blue baseball cap on .
